original_text: Now the full number of those who believed were of one heart and soul, and no one said that any of the things that belonged to him was his own, but they had everything in common.
korean_text: 믿는 무리가 한마음과 한 뜻이 되어 모든 물건을 서로 통용하고 자기 재물을 조금이라도 자기 것이라 하는 이가 하나도 없더라

sentences.original_text: Now the full number of those who believed
were of one heart and soul
that any of the things that belonged to him
but they had everything in common
